Text: Thanks for the upload! Downloading now.

In case anyone is to lazy to check it, the version of Bloody Kisses included in this torrent is the extended Digipack version in the paper gatefold cover, not the edited standard release in the plastic jewel case.

Kitlope--
I just wanted to finally mention how many great torrents I've gotten from you the past few years.  You provide excellent info and after I've found a torrent, especially FLAC, which I'm always looking for, I search for your name and get more trackers.  Please keep up the good work and I'll keep seeding.
